name: @highcharts/connectors-morningstar
description: Highcharts connectors for Morningstar Direct Web Services
author: Highsoft AS

scripts.api: npm run webpack && npm run api:server
scripts.build: npm run webpack && npm run build:prepare && npm run build:copy && npm run build:pack && npm run build:cleanup
scripts.build:copy: npm run copy:code && npm run copy:docs && npm run copy:json
scripts.demos: npm run webpack && npm run demos:server
scripts.docs: npm run webpack && npm run docs:server
scripts.scripts: npm run scripts:bin && npm run scripts:code
scripts.scripts:bin: rm -rf bin/ && tsc -p src/CLI/ && chmod +x bin/*.js && cp -R src/CLI/Static bin/ && ts-node tools/api
scripts.reset: rm -rf bin/ build/ code/ node_modules/ ; npm i
scripts.test: npm run webpack && npm run test:eslint && npm run test:tests
scripts.webpack: npm run scripts && webpack && npm run webpack:dts
scripts.webpack:dts:cm: cp src/webpack.d.ts code/connectors-morningstar.d.ts && cp src/webpack.d.ts code/connectors-morningstar.src.d.ts
scripts.webpack:dts:dbm: cp src/webpack.d.ts code/dashboards-morningstar.d.ts && cp src/webpack.d.ts code/dashboards-morningstar.src.d.ts
scripts.webpack:dts:dgm: cp src/webpack.d.ts code/datagrid-morningstar.d.ts && cp src/webpack.d.ts code/datagrid-morningstar.src.d.ts
scripts.webpack:dts:hcm: cp src/webpack.d.ts code/highcharts-morningstar.d.ts && cp src/webpack.d.ts code/highcharts-morningstar.src.d.ts
